name: Nepali Aloo
description: Another one of my Masi's recipe.
recipeIngredient: 3  medium potatoes chopped (this dish is usually made with baby potatoes)
3  serano peppers (chillies sliced into thin long slices)
2 inch ginger sliced into thin long slices
5 cloves garlic sliced into thin long slices
2 teaspoons vinegar (or more for a more sour taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the potatoes and shallow or deep fry them.
recipeInstructions.name: Chop the potatoes and shallow or deep fry them.

recipeInstructions.text: Fry the sliced chillies, ginger and garlic
recipeInstructions.name: Fry the sliced chillies, ginger and garlic

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan with a little oil on medium heat, add the mustard seeds and cumin seeds.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan with a little oil on medium heat, add the mustard seeds and cumin seeds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the potatoes, chillies, ginger, garlic, turmeric and salt and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the potatoes, chillies, ginger, garlic, turmeric and salt and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: add in the vinegar and simmer for 5-10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: add in the vinegar and simmer for 5-10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot!!! with rotis or  naan !!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot!!! with rotis or  naan !!
